headline: Jim Cramer Says He’s “Worried About Brighthouse Financial”
summary: Brighthouse Financial, Inc. (NASDAQ:BHF) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared insights on. A caller asked if they should buy, sell, or hold the stock, and Cramer stated: “I’m worried about Brighthouse Financial… I prefer Chubb if I’m going to be in insurance business. I know Chubb has been a weak stock of late, […]

headline: AM Best Assigns Issue Credit Ratings to Chubb INA Holdings LLC’s Senior Unsecured Bonds
summary: OLDWICK, N.J., July 31, 2025--AM Best has assigned Long-Term Issue Credit Ratings of "a+" (Excellent) to Chubb INA Holdings LLC (Chubb) (Delaware) recently announced CNY 4.5 billion (approximately USD 626 million) issuance of senior unsecured bonds in the Hong Kong market in three tranches, which are guaranteed by Chubb Limited: CNY 1 billion 2.5% senior unsecured bonds due 2030; CNY 1.5 billion 2.75% senior unsecured bonds due 2035; and CNY 2 billion 3.05% senior unsecured bonds due 2055. headline: Everest Group Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y

headline: Can Berkshire's Share Buyback Policy Boost its Bottom Line?
summary: BRK.B ramps up buybacks amid scarce deals, boosting EPS and ROE while signaling confidence in its intrinsic value.

headline: Prudential Financial Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Decline Y/Y
summary: PRU beats Q2 estimates with EPS of $3.58 and $13.5B in revenues, despite a year-over-year decline in revenues.
